name: Important Dates Dashboard Widget
author: Doug Higson

sections.description: Your dashboard is the first thing most WordPress admins see when they log in to a website – why not add a space for them to see important dates coming up? With the Important Dates Dashboard Widget – you can do just that. Easily add and manage upcoming events, birthdays, anniversaries and more with this lightweight plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Install via the built-in WordPress plugin installer. Or download and unzip important-dates-dashboard-widget.zip inside the plugins directory for your site (typically wp-content/plugins/)
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ admin menu in WordPress
  3. From the new widget in your admin dashboard, click \”add New\” to add a new date.
sections.faq:
Where do I add the date?

Once installed, click on the \”add New\” button to add and name your first date.

How many dates can I install?

As many as you want – there is no limit.
sections.changelog:
1.0 – initial release
1.01 – Better Notifications, Updated Navigation, Improved Instructions
1.02 – Cleaned up Options Page

short_description: Display important dates in a widget on the Wordpress dashboard.
